mapper.select: SELECT device_type_id, device_type_id as device_type_idd, device_type_name, device_type_model, device_type_spec, device_type_supplier, device_type_producer, device_type_quantity, device_type_warranty FROM device_type order by device_type_id ASC

SELECT device_type_id, device_type_name FROM device_type
order by device_type_id ASC
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM device_type WHERE device_type_id IN
#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT device_type_id, device_type_id as device_type_idd, device_type_name, device_type_model, device_type_spec, device_type_supplier, device_type_producer, device_type_quantity, device_type_warranty FROM device_type WHERE device_type_id LIKE CONCAT( '%', #{deviceTypeId},'%' )

SELECT device_type_id, device_type_id as device_type_idd, device_type_name, device_type_model, device_type_spec, device_type_supplier, device_type_producer, device_type_quantity, device_type_warranty FROM device_type WHERE device_type_name LIKE CONCAT( '%', #{deviceTypeName},'%' )
mapper.sql: device_type_id, device_type_name, device_type_model, device_type_spec, device_type_supplier, device_type_producer, device_type_quantity, device_type_warranty
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from device_type
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
insert into device_type
device_type_id,
device_type_name,
device_type_model,
device_type_spec,
device_type_supplier,
device_type_producer,
device_type_quantity,

update device_type
device_type_id = #{record.deviceTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
device_type_name = #{record.deviceTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
device_type_model = #{record.deviceTypeModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
device_type_spec = #{record.deviceTypeSpec,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

device_type_producer = #{record.deviceTypeProducer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
device_type_quantity = #{record.deviceTypeQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
device_type_warranty = #{record.deviceTypeWarranty,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update device_type set device_type_id = #{record.deviceTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, device_type_name = #{record.deviceTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, device_type_model = #{record.deviceTypeModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, device_type_spec = #{record.deviceTypeSpec,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, device_type_supplier = #{record.deviceTypeSupplier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, device_type_producer = #{record.deviceTypeProducer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, device_type_quantity = #{record.deviceTypeQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, device_type_warranty = #{record.deviceTypeWarranty,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

update device_type
device_type_name = #{deviceTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
device_type_model = #{deviceTypeModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
device_type_spec = #{deviceTypeSpec,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
device_type_supplier = #{deviceTypeSupplier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
device_type_producer = #{deviceTypeProducer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
device_type_quantity = #{deviceTypeQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
device_type_warranty = #{deviceTypeWarranty,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where device_type_id = #{deviceTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update device_type set device_type_name = #{deviceTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, device_type_model = #{deviceTypeModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, device_type_spec = #{deviceTypeSpec,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, device_type_supplier = #{deviceTypeSupplier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, device_type_producer = #{deviceTypeProducer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, device_type_quantity = #{deviceTypeQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, device_type_warranty = #{deviceTypeWarranty,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where device_type_id = #{deviceTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
